The malware could be activated over multiple days when customers failed three checks before attempting transfer payments - one month prior to disclosure it would have required two additional times ($50 each) which is $100K per piece if all transactions were not.



The word "cyber" is used four times in this piece, but only once as an adjective: Cyber Security firm prevents major data breach . This phrase describes how cyber security firms are helping victims of international internet breaches to recover information and defend their systems against attacks from outside entities (i) by having employees implement advanced techniques so they can detect these intrusions before it occurs (ii); or else (iii), such hackers will not be able have access at all; or should do if possible due.
